articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Joint Performance Given by Russian and Korean Artistes
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Joint Performance Given by Russian and Korean Artistes
Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed a joint performance given by the visiting Orchestra of the 21st Century of Russia and the State Academic Unaccompanied Chorus Named after Yurlov, the Unhasu Orchestra of the DPRK and the State Merited Chorus of the Korean People's Army at the Mansudae Art Theatre Tuesday.
					 He was greeted at the theatre by Pavel Borisovich Ovsyannikov, head and chief conductor of the orchestra, Valery Sukhinin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and official diplomats of the Russian embassy here.
					
					 Kim Jong Il warmly welcomed the orchestra's visit to the DPRK and had a cordial conversation with the guests.
					
					 The performance raised its curtain with the national anthems of the DPRK and the Russian Federation. 
					
					 Its repertoire included chorus "Song Devoted to Marshal Kim Il Sung", "Song of the Proclamation of the People's Republic", chorus and orchestra "Overture of Friendship" newly created by Pavel Ovsyannikov, female vocal trio "Birthplace Covered with Snow," unaccompanied chorus "Sound of Evening Bell", male solo "Cavatina of Figaro" and other famous songs of the two countries and the world.
					
					 The performance given by renowned conductors, musicians and singers including international concours winners and people's and merited artistes of the two countries was highly acclaimed by the audience for its high artistry and excellent representation. 
					
					 The performance ended with the chorus "Song of General Kim Jong Il".
					
					 Kim Jong Il conveyed a floral basket to the artistes congratulating them on their successful presentation. 
					
					 At the end of the performance he met with leading members of the orchestra and expressed deep thanks for giving a splendid joint performance to the delight of the Korean people significantly celebrating the 61st birthday of the DPRK. 
					
					 Among the audience were Kim Yong Chun, minister of the People's Armed Forces, Choe Thae Bok and Kim Ki Nam, secretaries of the WPK Central Committee, Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, leading officials of the party and the army, creators and artistes and servicepersons of the KPA.

articles.title: National Meeting Held to Mark 61st Birthday of DPRK
articles.content:
National Meeting Held to Mark 61st Birthday of DPRK 
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held at the April 25 House of Culture on Tuesday to celebrate the 61st anniversary of the founding of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Present there were senior party, army and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly, leading officials of party, armed forces and power bodies, public organizations, ministries and national institutions and servicepersons of the Korean People's Army, officials in the fields of science, education, culture and arts, public health and media and working people in Pyongyang and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, congratulatory groups and delegations and home-visiting groups of overseas compatriots and other overseas compatriots.
					
					 Present there on invitation were diplomatic envoys of various countries and representatives of international organizations here, delegations of various countries and foreign guests now staying in the DPRK.
					
					Kim Yong Il, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, in a report at the meeting said that the founding of the DPRK enabled the Korean people to become masters of state and emerge a mighty and dignified people carving out a new history of social progress and the building of a rich and powerful country, grasping their destinies in their own hands for the first time in the history of the Korean nation spanning 5,000 years.
					
					 With the birth of the DPRK it emerged a legitimate independent and sovereign state in the international arena and there appeared a new type socialist state which embodied the idea of independence of the popular masses based on the Juche idea, the first of its kind in the human history, the reporter noted, and continued:
					
					 Under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung, the DPRK achieved a historic victory in the hard-fought Fatherland Liberation War against the U.S. imperialists' armed invasion, honorably defending the freedom and independence of the country. It successfully carried out the socialist revolution and vigorously accelerated socialist construction, thereby building a socialist state centered on the popular masses which demonstrates its might as a country independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence and paving a wide avenue for the development of the country and the prosperity of the nation. 
					
					Kim Il Sung's Juche-oriented idea of nation-building and his exploits performed in it have been steadfastly carried forward by General Secretary Kim Jong Il and the DPRK has reached a new higher stage in its development.
					
					 Kim Jong Il published the famous work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Socialist State of Juche with Invincible Might" last year. This constitutes an immortal exploit as he provided ever-victorious guidelines for building a socialist state in the era of Songun. 
					
					 Thanks to the outstanding Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il, Songun Korea, the country of Juche, is now towering high as a political, ideological, military and scientific and technological power, an envy of the whole world, and the Korean people have confidently come close to the gate to a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Thanks to the Songun politics of Kim Jong Il and his independent foreign policy, the DPRK opened a new chapter of a nation-wide movement for national reunification guided by the idea of "By our nation itself" for the first time in the history of national division and the international prestige of the country and its influence have risen remarkably.
					
					 The reporter called on all the servicepersons of the KPA and people to hold Kim Il Sung in high esteem for all ages as the father of socialist Korea and eternal President of the DPRK and make the DPRK shine forever as the glorious state of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He also underlined the need to actively uphold and faithfully implement the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration, a great programme for independent reunification, and the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing it, and reenergize the movement for national reunification, taking "By our nation itself" as its basic idea.
					
					 The DPRK government will boost the solidarity with the peoples of all the countries in the world advocating independence, consistently holding  fast to the idea of independence, peace and friendship and wage a dynamic struggle for building an independent and peaceful new world against aggression and war in the future, too.

articles.title: Felicitations to Kim Jong Il, Kim Yong Nam and Kim Yong Il
articles.content:
Felicitations to Kim Jong Il, Kim Yong Nam and Kim Yong Il
						
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il, President of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly Kim Yong Nam and Premier of the Cabinet Kim Yong Il received a message of greetings from President of the People's Republic of China Hu Jintao, Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Chinese National People's Congress Wu Bangguo and Premier of the State Council Wen Jiabao on Tuesday on the occasion of the 61st birthday of the DPRK.
					 Saying that the foundation of the DPRK opened up a new chapter in the history of Korea, the message continued:
					
					 Over the past 61 years the Korean people have achieved incessant successes to be proud of in the socialist revolution and construction in single mind in the spirit of fortitude under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, General Secretary Kim Jong Il and the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					
					 We are sincerely rejoiced over this and wholeheartedly wish the Korean people greater successes in all fields in the future.
					
					 The party, government and people of China constantly set store by the traditional Sino-Korean friendship.
					
					 It is our hope that we would continue to boost bilateral exchange and cooperation with the DPRK side in all spheres and put spurs to furthering the Sino-Korean friendship of good neighborliness, friendship and cooperation in the spirit of "Inheriting tradition, facing up to the future, building good neighborly friendship and strengthening cooperation" on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the two countries and thus promote well-being of the two peoples and ensure peace and stability in the region.
					
					 We wish the DPRK prosperity and its people happiness.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Chief of Palestinian National Authority
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Chief of Palestinian National Authority
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket by Mahmoud Abbas, chief of the Palestinian National Authority, on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 The floral basket was handed to an official concerned on Tuesday by Ibrahim Abu Mualik, charge d' affaires ad interim of the Palestinian embassy here.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Presented with Floral Baskets and Congratulatory Letters
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Presented with Floral Baskets and Congratulatory Letters 
Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with floral baskets and congratulatory letters by the diplomatic corps and the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 They were conveyed on Tuesday to Pak Ui Chun, foreign minister of the DPRK, by Noorullah Khan, Pakistani ambassador to the DPRK who is doyen of the diplomatic corps, and to an official concerned by Aleksei Bartusov, Russian military attache, on behalf of the military attaches corps.

articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets Chinese Delegation
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Chinese Delegation
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday met and had a friendly talk with the friendship delegation of the China Association for International Friendly Contact led by Vice-President Li Xiaohua at the Mansudae Assembly Hall, which is on a visit to the DPRK on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the founding of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Chinese Delegation
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Chinese Delegation
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the friendship delegation of the China Association for International Friendly Contact on a visit to the DPRK on the occasion of the 61st birthday of the DPRK.
					 The gift was handed to Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, by Li Xiaohua, vice-president of the association who is leading the delegation, on Tuesday.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Il 
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with floral baskets from the family of Zhang Weihua, Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, and Hiroshima Prefectural Citizens' Council for Japan-Korea Friendship Tuesday on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the founding of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.

articles.title: Concert of Young People Held
articles.content:
Concert of Young People Held
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- A concert of young people was held at the Central Youth Hall on Monday to celebrate the 61st birthday of the DPRK.
					 The performers sang high praises of the immortal feats performed by President Kim Il Sung in numbers including female vocal trio "Country of the Leader".
					
					 They impressively represented Kim Jong Il's leadership traits in female vocal quartet "The General Is Identical to the Leader", chorus "General Is Our Father" and other numbers.
					
					 Their repertoire also included numbers dealing with the proud features of the young vanguard dedicating all their wisdom and energies to building a great prosperous and powerful nation, growing up to be revolutionary fighters of Songun who would steadfastly carry forward the traditions of Juche under the care of the motherland.

articles.title: Chinese Fine Art Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
Chinese Fine Art Exhibition Opens
						
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- A Chinese fine art exhibition was opened at the People's Palace of Culture on Monday to celebrate the 61st anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 Displayed there are more than 90 art works created by well-known painters of China. 
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Jon Yong Jin, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who doubles as vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the DPRK-China Friendship Association, officials concerned and working people in the city, the friendship delegation of the China Association for International Friendly Contact led by Vice-President Li Xiaohua and Liu Xiaoming, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and officials of the Chinese embassy here.
					
					 Jon Yong Jin in his opening address referred to the fact that President Kim Il Sung provided the DPRK-China friendly relations together with Chairman Mao Zedong and Premier Zhou Enlai.
					
					He recalled that recently General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed the drama "A Sentry under a Neon Lamp" and said that it is the invariable will of the Workers' Party and people of Korea to further consolidate and develop the precious DPRK-China friendship provided by the leaders of the elder generation of the two countries.
					
					Then, speeches were made by Li Xiaohua and Li Yinghai on behalf of Chinese painters.
					
					 The speakers noted that the traditional Sino-DPRK friendship is the friendship that struck deep roots in the minds of the peoples of the two countries, standing all sorts of tests of history.  
					
					 They expressed belief that the exhibition would contribute to promoting the exchange between the two countries in the cultural field and significantly decorating the "year of Sino-DPRK friendship."
					
					 At the end of the opening ceremony, the participants looked round the art works on display.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Brightens Dignity and Might of DPRK
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Brightens Dignity and Might of DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea, founded on September 9, Juche 37 (1948), is demonstrating its dignity and might all over the world as a socialist political and military power.
					 It is thanks to Kim Jong Il who is wisely leading the Korean revolution along the road of victory with his outstanding political caliber and boundless devotion to the people.
					
					 After the collapse of socialism in various countries in the 1990s, the imperialists made desperate efforts to exterminate socialism on the globe, loudly talking about the "end of socialism" and the "victory of capitalism".
					
					 The world people watched the DPRK, thinking their own way whether the DPRK would defend socialism. However the DPRK has not given up socialism but vigorously advanced along the road of Songun revolution, holding higher the banner of socialism.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, taking upon himself the destiny of the country and the nation, pursued the original Songun politics to bridge over the prevailing grave situation and dynamically aroused the army and people to the struggle for defending socialism.
					
					 He regarded the military affairs as the first and foremost state affairs and gave priority to the increasing of defence capabilities. Through his continued inspection of units of the Korean People's Army he prepared it to do its bit as the army of the Party, the army of the revolution and, at the same time, led it take an active part in socialist construction and make a breakthrough for building a great, prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 Under his leadership, the servicepersons and people with a firm determination to build a thriving socialist nation on this land without fail have created world-startling miracles and innovations one after another across the country.
					
					 In the teeth of rigorous trials in the recent years gigantic land rezoning projects have been done vigorously, many monumental edifices of the Songun era including power stations and modern production bases constructed in different parts of the country and the economy put on a firm uptrend.
					
					 The successful launch of the artificial satellite Kwangmyongsong No. 2 in April last fully demonstrated the national power of Songun Korea and the rapid development of space science and technology.
					
					 Under the leadership of Kim Jong Il the DPRK will prosper forever, displaying its invincible might.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Founder of DPRK
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Founder of DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The national flags of the Republic are fluttering in streets and residential quarters of the DPRK on the occasion of its 61st founding anniversary (September 9).
					 Seeing the national flag, the servicepersons and people of Korea are retrospecting with deep emotion the immortal feats of President Kim Il Sung for nation-building.
					
					 The President in his teens made a historic resolve not to return home before Korea had become independent and embarked on the road of revolution. He waged sanguinary anti-Japanese war for 20 years and thus liberated the country by force of arms. 
					
					 As soon as he returned in triumph, he put his heart and soul into the work for building a new Korea without taking a rest even a day after the anti-Japanese war, thus successfully accomplishing the historic cause of founding the Party and army.
					
					 He, at the same time, energetically pushed ahead with the work for founding the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					
					Under his outstanding leadership, the constitution, name, national emblem and national flag of the DPRK were instituted.
					
					With the foundation of the DPRK by the President in September Juche 37 (1948), the Korean people became the master of the state and society for the first time in the 5,000-year-long history, the independent and creative people who pave a new era of history, taking their destiny in their hands and the dignified people that no one dare pounce upon them.
					
					 The DPRK came to proceed into the international arena on an equal par with countries, big or small, holding aloft the banner of Juche as a full-fledged independent and sovereign state.
					
					 The exploits performed by the President for founding the DPRK are shining under the leadership of Kim Jong Il, peerless brilliant commander of Songun.
					
					 Under the wise leadership of him who is devoting himself for the construction of a rich and powerful country and the happiness of the people, the DPRK is displaying its might as a powerful socialist state of Juche and the September 9 will be the holiday of Songun Korea for ever.

articles.title: 61st Birthday of DPRK Celebrated at DPRK Embassy in Moscow
articles.content:
61st Birthday of DPRK Celebrated at DPRK Embassy in Moscow
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- A reception was given at the DPRK embassy in Moscow on Sept. 4 on the occasion of the 61st birthday of the DPRK. 
					Present at the reception on invitation were Borodavkin, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and other officials of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, officials of the Ministry of Defense, the Ministry of Regional Development, the Ministry of Economic Development, the Ministry of Finance, the Ministry of Agriculture, the Ministry of Interior and the Academy of Sciences of Russia, lawmakers of the State Duma and the Federation Council, officials of the Moscow City Government, the "United Russia" Party, "A Just Russia", the Communist Party of the Federation, the Party for Peace and Unity, the All-Union Communist Party of Bolsheviks, the Liberal Democratic Party, the Communist Party of the Soviet Union, the Moscow City Association of Veterans, the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, the Russian Federation of International Charity Organizations "World of Goodwill", the "Russian Railways" Company, the United Confederation of Koreans in Russia and members of organizations for the study of the Juche idea.
					
					 On hand were DPRK Ambassador to Russia Kim Yong Jae and officials of the embassy. 
					
					The participants placed a floral basket and bouquets before the full-length picture of President Kim Il Sung standing together with General Secretary Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them before looking round the works of the peerlessly great persons and photos on the history of the DPRK.
					
					 Speeches were made there. 
					
					 Kim Yong Jae said that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Russia have favorably developed in the political, economic, cultural and other fields in the spirit of the joint documents agreed upon between the top leaders of the two countries and the treaty signed between the two states. He expressed belief that these relations would continue to develop in the interests of the two peoples. 
					
					 Borodavkin noted that the relations between Russia and the DPRK are close relations of friendship and ties of multi-faceted cooperation in line with the fundamental interests of the two peoples.
					
					 He added Russia would make efforts to invariably boost the mutually beneficial relations with the DPRK in the political, economic and cultural and other fields.

articles.title: Birthday of DPRK Celebrated
articles.content:
Birthday of DPRK Celebrated
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held in Vietnam, a seminar and a photo exhibition took place in Cambodia and a lecture and a photo exhibition in Guinea from August 29 to September 2 in the run-up to the 61st anniversary of the founding of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					Displayed in the venues of photo exhibitions were photos on the undying feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il in founding and developing the DPRK and the Korean people's struggle for the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 Speeches were made at the functions.
					
					 Pham Tat Dong, chairman of the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Association, said that the Vietnamese and Korean peoples have long developed the friendly and cooperative relations provided and cultivated by President Ho Chi Minh and Kim Il Sung, adding that the Vietnamese people have expressed full support to the fraternal Korean people in socialist construction and cause of national reunification.
					
					 Kong Sam Ol, deputy prime minister in charge of the Royal Palace of Cambodia, said that the Korean people have achieved eye-opening successes in building a thriving nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Il and hoped that they would register fresh successes in their efforts to open the gate to a thriving socialist nation in a few years to come, true to the behest of Kim Il Sung.
					
					The director general of the Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea highly praised Kim Il Sung as the father of the nation-building who built a socialist power which is standing firm in any storm and stress and the first country of the people in the history of the Korean nation spanning 5,000 years.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Delegation of Joson University
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Delegation of Joson University 
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a compatriotic talk with the delegation of education officials of Joson University of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan headed by Pak Jom Sok, vice-rector of the university, on a visit to the socialist motherland at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Tuesday.

articles.title: Reception Hosted by Brazilian Ambassador
articles.content:
Reception Hosted by Brazilian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Brazilian Ambassador to the DPRK Arnaldo Carrilho hosted a reception on Monday on the independence day of his country. 
					 Present at the reception on invitation were Pak Ui Chun, minister of Foreign Affairs, Kim Thae Jong, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Hyong Jun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, officials concerned and diplomatic envoys of various countries and representatives of international organizations here.
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Delegation of Kyodo News of Japan Arrives
articles.content:
Delegation of Kyodo News of Japan Arrives
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- A delegation of Kyodo News of Japan led by its President Satoshi Ishikawa arrived here today.

articles.title: 10th National Software Exhibition in Field of Education Held
articles.content:
10th National Software Exhibition in Field of Education Held
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The 10th national software exhibition in the field of education was held at the Three-Revolution Exhibition from Sept. 2 to 8.
					 On display there were more than 750 programs on educational information including multimedia, programs for experiment and practice simulations, programs for remote-controlled education and those for the management and operation of E-libraries.
					
					 Highly appreciated by the participants were programs presented by Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology, Pyongyang University of Construction and Building-Materials Industry, Pyongyang University of Medicine, Wonsan Jong Jun Thaek University of Economics, Phyongsong University of Education, Hamhung University of Computer Technology, Pyongyang College of Building Materials, Pyongyang Secondary School No. 1 and other educational institutions.
					
					 A closing ceremony took place on Tuesday.

articles.title: U.S. Reckless Moves for Production of New Type Bombs Flayed
articles.content:
U.S. Reckless Moves for Production of New Type Bombs Flayed
						
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- These days the U.S. is hell-bent on the production of Bunker-Busters for destroying underground structures. Meanwhile, a spokesman for the U.S. Air Force Command asserted that the U.S. is seriously concerned about underground nuclear facilities in north Korea or Iran.
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Tuesday says this self-exposes that the U.S. manufacture of this type bomb is meant for using it when launching an armed invasion against the DPRK.
					
					 The news analyst goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is now seeking to disable the DPRK's war deterrent for self-defence in a bid to upset the balance of forces and create military conditions favorable for carrying out its strategy for mounting a preemptive attack on the DPRK.
					
					 The above-said moves of the U.S. made it all the more clearer that the "peaceful settlement" of the issue of the Korean Peninsula and "diplomatic efforts for dialogue" oft-repeated by the U.S. are nothing but rhetoric to deceive the public opinion at home and abroad and that military confrontation and use of force have become the keynote of the U.S. policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The reality goes to clearly prove that the U.S. is, indeed, the arch criminal wrecking the world peace and security as it does not hesitate to commit the criminal act of inflicting even a nuclear war on mankind in a bid to realize its ambition for domination.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will never pardon the U.S. keen to bring horrible disasters to the earth, obsessed by its wild ambition for world hegemony.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to roll back at once its anachronistic policy of strength, pondering over the grave consequences to be entailed by its reckless hostile policy toward the DPRK.

articles.title: End to U.S. Forces' Presence in S. Korea Demanded
articles.content:
End to U.S. Forces' Presence in S. Korea Demanded
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- If the United States persistently enforces its policy of military presence in south Korea, lending a deaf ear to the voices of the peoples of Korea and other countries of the world demanding the earliest withdrawal of the U.S. forces from south Korea, it will face bitterer rebuff and denunciation at home and abroad. This warning is served by Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a signed article carried 64 years since the U.S. imperialists' occupation of south Korea.
					 The U.S. forces' landing in south Korea was aimed at keeping it under its occupation and turning it into its colony, dividing Korea into two parts and using its southern half as a military appendage for executing its policy of aggression, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. moves to seek its forces' permanent presence in south Korea and bolster up its combat capability are a challenge to the demand of the times for the withdrawal of foreign troops and their trend.
					
					 The U.S. should pull its forces out of south Korea as early as possible as demanded by international law and the times. 
					
					 The termination of the U.S. forces' presence in south Korea would remove the basic factor of threatening the peace in Korea and the biggest hurdle lying in the way of national reunification.
					
					 The pullback of the U.S. forces from south Korea would result in eliminating the most dangerous hotbed of war in the world and thus help create environment favorable for ensuring peace and security on the Korean peninsula and the rest of Asia and the world.
					
					 How to approach the issue of the U.S. forces' withdrawal from south Korea serves as a barometer judging whether the U.S. has a will to rectify its hostile policy towards the DPRK or not and whether it wishes to see Korea's reunification and peace or not.
					
					 The world is waiting for the U.S. to make a switchover in its attitude.

articles.title: Struggle against Imperialist Aggression and Plunder Called for
articles.content:
Struggle against Imperialist Aggression and Plunder Called for
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The imperialists are now persisting in their aggression and plunder of other countries, developing countries, in particular. But they will only precipitate their own doom.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The imperialists' intensified aggression and plunder would only give momentum to the struggle of the peoples of developing countries for independent development.
					
					 They are countering those acts of the imperialists with unity and collective self-reliance.
					
					 The imperialists are now losing levers for the unlimited exploitation and plunder of the Latin American countries one by one due to their efforts for regional integration, cooperation and solidarity.
					
					 Economic stagnation is gaining in width and depth, likely to fester and last indefinitely in the capitalist countries now in the grip of chronic economic crisis exemplified by shortage of raw materials and fuel and marketing difficulties.
					
					 The present reality goes to prove that only when the neo-colonialist methods of plunder are eliminated from the international arena and a new fair international economic order is established to put strong spurs to the economic development in developing countries is it possible to pave the way for weathering the worldwide financial and economic crises.
					
					 The imperialists' harsher exploitation and plunder of developing countries would only touch off stronger resistance of the peoples desirous of independence and socio-economic progress and result in further deepening their political and economic crises.
					
					 The imperialists will find no way out of the above-said crises unless they roll back their policy of aggression and plunder quite contrary to the trend of the times. Their policy of aggression and plunder, a policy against justice and history, would only precipitate their own doom.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Peru
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Peru
						
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "Answers to the Questions Raised by the CNN Press Corps" was brought out in booklet by the Grafica Aj Hermanos Publishing House of Peru on September 1. 
					 The work, published on April 17, Juche 83 (1994), expounds the idea that it is the invariable stand of the DPRK to settle the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula and ease the tension through dialogue and negotiations and it is also the common desire of the two peoples and a requirement of the present era to improve the relations between the DPRK and the United States.
					
					  The work, in particular, stresses the fact that General Secretary Kim Jong Il who is wisely leading the Party, the army and the state is boundlessly loyal to the country and its people and possessed of excellent personality and qualification as a popular leader.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Sweden
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Sweden
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Socialist State of Juche with Invincible Might" was brought out in booklet by the Vallingby Publishing House in Stockholm, Sweden. 
					 A book releasing ceremony was held at the publishing house on September 2.

articles.title: Story about Curing Young Worker
articles.content:
Story about Curing Young Worker
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- On a spring day of Juche 35 (1946), Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese heroine, was told by the  director of the then Yangdok Railway Hospital of South Phyongan Province that a young worker got hurt seriously in his leg and was in a critical condition.
					 The director told her that the leg of the patient should be cut off. Listening to him, she asked him whether there was no other treatment method than cutting off and what medicines were needed.
					
					 The director, who was reproaching himself, said that the hospital ran out of antibiotic medicines.
					
					 Then she felt easy and warmly told about securing needed medicines and curing the leg of the young man without fail.
					
					 Amid her meticulous care, the wife of the director went to Pyongyang to bring needed medicines and the hospital treated the young man day and night.
					
					 The young man had his leg completely cured in six months to walk freely.
					
					 The doctors and railway workers said with deep emotion that thanks to the woman commander of Mt. Paektu the young worker came to have the bright future of youth again.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia funcion de artistas rusos y coreanos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia funcion de artistas rusos y coreanos
Pyongyang, 9 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, presencio el dia 8 en el Teatro de Arte Mansudae la funcion artistica que ofrecieron en conjunto la Orquesta del Siglo 21 de Rusia y el Coro Academico Nacional No Acompanado Yurlov, de visita en Corea, la Orquesta Unhasu de Corea y el Coro Estatal Benemerito del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					Le acogio en el mismo lugar el jefe y director principal de la primera banda rusa, Pavel Ovsyannikov, el embajador de la Federacion Rusa en Corea, Valery Sukhinin, y otros diplomaticos oficiales de la embajada rusa.
					
					El Dirigente dio calida bienvenida a la Orquesta por su visita a Corea y sostuvo cordiales conversaciones con los huespedes.
					
					En este espectaculo, iniciado con la interpretacion de los himnos nacionales de ambos paises, se presentaron los coros "Himno al Mariscal           Kim Il Sung" y "Cancion de proclamacion de la Republica Popular", el coro y musica orquestal "Obertura de amistad" -pieza creada por Pavel Ovsyannikov en esta visita a Corea-, el trio femenino "Casa natal cubierta de nieve blanca", el coro sin acompanamiento instrumental "Campanada de la noche", el solo masculino "Cavatina de Figaro" y otras canciones famosas de los dos paises y del mundo.
					
					En la ocasion actuaron los celebres directores, ejecutantes y cantantes de ambos paises incluyendo los ganadores de concursos internacionales y actores del Pueblo y Benemeritos.
					
					Los espectadores recompensaron con efusiva ovacion las grandes habilidades artisticas y magnifica interpretacion que caracterizaron ese espectaculo terminado con el coro "Cancion del General Kim Jong Il".
					
					El Dirigente envio un cesto de flores a los ejecutantes felicitandoles los exitos de la funcion.
					
					Finalizada la funcion, se encontro con los miembros directivos de la Orquesta y les expreso profundo agradecimiento por esta magnifica funcion conjunta que alegro al pueblo coreano que celebra significativamente el 61o aniversario de la fundacion de la RPDC.
					
					Entre los acompanantes del Dirigente figuraban el ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, Kim Yong Chun, los secretarios del Comite Central del PTC, Choe Thae Bok y Kim Ki Nam, el vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Yang Hyong Sop, los cuadros directivos del partido y el ejercito, los creadores, los artistas y los militares del EPC.

articles.title: Acto central por el 61o aniversario de la fundacion de la RPDC
articles.content:
Acto central por el 61o aniversario de la fundacion de la RPDC
Pyongyang, 8 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 8 en la Casa Cultural 25 de Abril el acto central por el 61o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					En la ocasion participaron los cuadros del partido, el ejercito y el Estado, el presidente de partido amigo, los diputados a la Asamblea Popular Suprema, los funcionarios directivos de las instituciones del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, las organizaciones sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, los funcionarios de los dominios de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, los trabajadores capitalinos, el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang y los compatriotas residentes en ultramar, que vinieron aqui integrando los grupos de felicitacion y de visita y las delegaciones e individualmente.
					
					Entre los invitados se distinguian los representantes diplomaticos y los delegados de las organizaciones internacionales, acreditados en Corea, y las delegaciones de varios paises y los huespedes extranjeros, de visita en Corea.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del premier del Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC, Kim Yong Il.
					
					Gracias a la fundacion de la RPDC, el pueblo coreano se hizo el muy fuerte y digno que crea la nueva historia del progreso social y la construccion de una patria prospera siendo el dueno del poder estatal por primera vez en la historia nacional de 5 milenios y el forjador de su propio destino, comenzo el orador y continuo:
					
					Ademas, la RPDC emergio en la arena internacional como digno Estado independiente y soberano y como pais socialista de nuevo tipo que en vista de la historia de la humanidad, materializa por primera vez segun la idea Juche el ideal independiente de las masas populares.
					
					Bajo la destacada orientacion del Presidente Kim Il Sung, la RPDC defendio honrosamente la libertad y la independencia de la patria logrando la victoria historica en la ardua Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria (1950-1953) contra la invasion armada del imperialismo norteamericano.
					
					Edifico un Estado socialista centrado en las masas populares y dignificado por la independencia, la autarquia y la autodefensa, al cumplir exitosamente la revolucion socialista y acelerar la construccion socialista.
					
					De esta manera, abrio el horizonte amplio y prometedor para el desarrollo del pais y la prosperidad nacional.
					
					La original idea y las hazanas del Presidente en aras de la construccion del Estado continuan firmemente gracias al Dirigente Kim Jong Il y la RPDC entro en la nueva etapa mas alta de su desarrollo.
					
					El Dirigente publico el ano pasado su obra clasica "La Republica Popular Democratica de Corea es el Estado socialista del Juche con invencible poderio", lo cual constituye una imborrable proeza que preparo la certera guia directriz de la construccion del Estado socialista de la epoca del Songun (priorizacion militar).
					
					Gracias a la sabia guia del Dirigente sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun, la Corea del Songun, nuestra patria del Juche, se ha convertido en una potencia en las areas ideologica, politica, militar y cientifico-tecnica, de que se admira todo el mundo, y el pueblo coreano llego a pasos firmes a la entrada a la gran potencia prospera socialista.
					
					Gracias a la politica de Songun y la politica exterior independiente del Dirigente, nuestra Republica pudo abrir una nueva epoca del movimiento pannacional por la reunificacion de la patria bajo el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" por primera vez en la historia de la division nacional y elevar extraordinariamente el prestigio e influencia internacionales del pais.
					
					Todos los oficiales y soldados del EPC y otros habitantes deben enaltecer a Kim Il Sung como fundador de Corea socialista y eterno Presidente de la RPDC y hacer brillar eternamente nuestra patria como el glorioso Estado del Presidente.
					
					Tambien tienen que defender activamente y ejecutar sinceramente la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur del 15 de Junio, gran programa de la reunificacion independiente y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, programa practico de la primera, y activar mas el movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria tomando por el ideal fundamental el de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales".
					
					El gobierno de la RPDC luchara activamente tambien en el futuro por fortalecer la solidaridad con los pueblos de todos los paises del mundo que abogan por la independencia tomando invariablemente el ideal de independencia, la paz y la amistad y construir un nuevo mundo independiente y pacifico oponiendose a la agresion y la guerra.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe cesto de flores de Mahmoud Abbas
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe cesto de flores de Mahmoud Abbas
Pyongyang, 8 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio un cesto de flores que le enviara el Jefe de la Autoridad Nacional de Palestina, Mahmoud Abbas, en ocasion del 61o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					  El encargado de negocios a.i. palestino en Corea, Ibrahim Abu Mualek, lo entrego el dia 8 a un funcionario coreano.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe presente de entidad vietnamita
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe presente de entidad vietnamita
Pyongyang, 8 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio presente que le dedicara el Club de Amistad Vietnam-Corea.
					El presidente del Comite Vietnamita de Apoyo a Corea y del citado club, Tran Tho Chu, de visita en Corea, lo entrego a un funcionario coreano.
